q1.questionText: If students == ["Alex", "Bob", "Dylan"], which index corresponds to "Bob"?

q2.questionText: If students == ["Alex", "Bob", "Dylan"], which name corresponds to index 2?

q3.questionText: Arrays are enclosed by , and elements are separated by ,.

q4.questionText: If the length of an array is equal to n then the index of the last element is ,.

q5.questionText: Which of the following arrays have "a" in index 1?

q6.questionText: Select the statements that are not true about arrays.
questionOptions: The elements in an array don't remain in their same index.
questionAnswer: The elements in an array don't remain in their same index.
